desc: Specialising in fly tying materials in the UK, we supply a range of fly tying essentials such as hackle (capes & saddles), hooks, CDC (cul de canard), marabou and fly tying threads. We supply brands such as Semperfli, Veevus, Metz, Turrall, Nature's Spirit, Maruto, Peak and recently fly fishing equipment from Cortland.

layout.text: Your Essentials for crafting the perfect flies
View our full range of fly tying and fly fishing products
